overview: Naina is a three months pregnant woman, and her husband, Raj, is a college professor. Somehow Naina finds out that Raj is having an extramarital affair with his college student Rii, so she asks him to break up with Rii, a psychopath girl.
tagline: An unfaithful husband is trying to cooperate with his wife by killing his girlfriend.
title: Hanky Panky Murder
